mapper.select: SELECT id,name,linkman,phone,telephone,postal_code,address,g.grade_name,i.industry_name,s.source_name FROM emp left join your_database.grade g on emp.grade_id = g.grade_id left join your_database.source s on emp.source_id = s.source_id left join your_database.industry i on emp.industry_id = i.industry_id
